##   2.3. JSON-LD
Now that we worked out the idea of JSON and its GeoJSON specification we are ready to have a look at linked data. So, before getting into JSON-LD and GeoJSON-LD, we should have a look at the general concept of linked data.
Check out the video by [Manu Sporny](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManuSporny) that gives you a neat overview.
